title: Para Witches - Novel Updates
author: Yuki Toy   結城十維
description:
A modern witch-story woven by a pair of witches with paradoxical personalities.

Being named a genius before, she have lost her magic and remembrance, and could no longer fly high up in the sky.

A girl, a student of 'Tokyo University of Arts and Music' of an absurd personality—”Space Magician: Tsugumi,”

The one who have pursued her and arrived here, to Tokyo, a bothersome girl, a slight stalker—”Witch of Justice: Rino.”

Whereas solving diverse a troubles that had its occur amid Tokyo, two rugged individuals playing an active part in recovering a girl's lost force.

What is the answer that will choose the pair, and what the whereabouts of their love——>
